attributes.action: justice for rhys culley lighter sentence
attributes.additional_details: Rhys Culley was given an 8 year sentence for an isolated incident with his girlfriend. in court it was said there was no previous violence from him in relationship and is of good character. Murderers and paedophiles have had alot less sentences. This is a total injustice to this young man. this sentence NEEDS to be reduced. to read more of rhys story go to facebook and read his page called,,, We support rhys culley. Lets try and help reduce this injust sentencing. thankyou.

rejection.details: As it currently stands, your e-petition does not ask the government to do anything. We do not publish requests for publicity or links to facebook but we will look at revised wording that asks for action from HMG. If the sentencing was held within the last month, you can send your e-petition request directly to the Attorney General's Office.
